properties.entry: SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_SUBJECT , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , A.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , A.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_SUBJECT , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , B.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , B.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , B.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_SUBJECT , C.NOTICE_BODY , C.MEMBER_NO , E.MEMBER_NAME , C.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , C.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , C.NOTICE_STATUS FROM TBL_NOTICE C JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON (C.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE A ( A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_CATEGORY_CODE , A.NOTICE_SUBJECT , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , 'NT' , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBL_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT = (SELECT B.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT FROM TBL_NOTICE B WHERE B.NOTICE_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = ?

SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_SUBJECT , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , A.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE TBL_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_SUBJECT = ? , A.NOTICE_BODY = ? WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE TBL_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'N' WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_BODY LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_SUBJECT , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , A.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , A.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_SUBJECT , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , B.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , B.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , B.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_SUBJECT , C.NOTICE_BODY , C.MEMBER_NO , E.MEMBER_NAME , C.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , C.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , C.NOTICE_STATUS FROM TBL_NOTICE C JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON (C.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND E.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_SUBJECT , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , A.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , A.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_SUBJECT , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , B.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , B.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , B.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_SUBJECT , C.NOTICE_BODY , C.MEMBER_NO , E.MEMBER_NAME , C.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , C.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , C.NOTICE_STATUS FROM TBL_NOTICE C JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON (C.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.NOTICE_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_SUBJECT , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , A.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , A.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_SUBJECT , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , B.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , B.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , B.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_SUBJECT , C.NOTICE_BODY , C.MEMBER_NO , E.MEMBER_NAME , C.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , C.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , C.NOTICE_STATUS FROM TBL_NOTICE C JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON (C.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.NOTICE_BODY LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE A ( A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_CATEGORY_CODE , A.NOTICE_SUBJECT , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , 'RPR' , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT B ( B.REPORT_NO , B.REPORT_MEMBER_NO , B.REPORT_CODE , B.REPORT_DATE , B.REASON ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPORT_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'NULL' )
